etymology.description: 湛江 + 市 = city named Zhanjiang.
etymology.interpretation: Proper noun for the prefecture-level city in Guangdong; 湛江 is the toponym and 市 marks its administrative status as a city. Literally, 湛 means deep/limpid and 江 means river.

examples.chinese: 湛江市位于广东省西南部(湛江市位於廣東省西南部)。
examples.pinyin: Zhànjiāng Shì wèiyú Guǎngdōng Shěng xīnán bù.
examples.english: Zhanjiang City is located in the southwest of Guangdong Province.

examples.chinese: 我们计划去湛江市旅游(我們計劃去湛江市旅遊)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen jìhuà qù Zhànjiāng Shì lǚyóu.
examples.english: We plan to travel to Zhanjiang City.

examples.chinese: 湛江市有湛江湾和雷州半岛等景点(湛江市有湛江灣和雷州半島等景點)。
examples.pinyin: Zhànjiāng Shì yǒu Zhànjiāng Wān hé Léizhōu Bàndǎo děng jǐngdiǎn.
examples.english: Zhanjiang City has attractions such as Zhanjiang Bay and the Leizhou Peninsula.
